intel.q: What time does the crawl start and end?
intel.a: We meet at 9 PM and typically finish around 3-4 AM. You're welcome to leave earlier if needed — just let your guide know.
Absolutely. We've been running for 6 years with zero incidents. Our guides are trained locals who know the area, staff, and security at every venue.
Yes! About 40% of our crawlers come solo. It's one of the best ways to meet fellow travelers. We make introductions easy.
Entry to all 4 venues (no cover charges), a welcome drink at each stop, local bilingual guide, and WhatsApp support throughout the night.

intel.q: What if I need to cancel?
intel.a: Free rescheduling with 24 hours notice. We run Thursday, Friday, and Saturday so there's flexibility.
Smart casual. No sandals, flip-flops, or tank tops for guys. Jeans and a nice shirt work great. Ladies — whatever you're comfortable dancing in.
Yes! Groups of 8+ can book a private crawl with a custom route and dedicated guide. Perfect for bachelor/ette parties.
